channel.title: Server error please stuck as hell
channel.description:
[code] C:\Documents and Settings\iatex\Skrivbord\Server>ant run Buildfile: C:\Documents and Settings\iatex\Skrivbord\Server\build.xml
run: [java] 2010-nov-14 21:52:41 org.hyperion.Server main [java] INFO: Starting Hyperion... [java] 2010-nov-14 21:52:41 org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition ini t [java] INFO: Loading definitions... [java] 2010-nov-14 21:52:41 org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind [java] INFO: Binding to port : 43595... [java] 2010-nov-14 21:52:42 org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind [java] INFO: Binding to port : 8080... [java] 2010-nov-14 21:52:42 org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer start [java] INFO: Ready [java] 2010-nov-14 21:52:42 org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server bind [java] INFO: Binding to port : 43594... [java] 2010-nov-14 21:52:42 org.hyperion.rs2.ScriptManager <init> [java] INFO: Loading scripts... [java] 2010-nov-14 21:52:42 org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server start [java] INFO: Waiting for pending background loading tasks... [java] 2010-nov-14 21:52:45 org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition ini t [java] INFO: Loaded 25374 object definitions. [java] 2010-nov-14 21:52:45 org.hyperion.Server main [java] ALLVARLIG: Error starting Hyperion. [java] java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: org.hyperion.cache.InvalidC acheException: java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Documents and Settings\iatex\Sk rivbord\Server\.\data\cache\main_file_cache.dat (Det gÕr inte att hitta filen) [java] at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerGet(FutureTask.java :222) [java] at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.get(FutureTask.java:83) [java] at org.hyperion.util.BlockingExecutorService.waitForPendingTasks (BlockingExecutorService.java:50) [java] at org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server.start(RS2Server.java:74) [java] at org.hyperion.Server.main(Server.java:36) [java] Caused by: org.hyperion.cache.InvalidCacheException: java.io.FileNot FoundException: C:\Documents and Settings\iatex\Skrivbord\Server\.\data\cache\ma in_file_cache.dat (Det gÕr inte att hitta filen) [java] at org.hyperion.cache.Cache.<init>(Cache.java:84) [java] at org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager.load(ObjectManager.java: 44) [java] at org.hyperion.rs2.model.World$2.call(World.java:125) [java] at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(FutureTask.java :303) [java] at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(FutureTask.java:138) [java] at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(Thread PoolExecutor.java:886) [java] at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(ThreadPool Executor.java:908) [java] at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) [java] Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Documents and Settings\ iatex\Skrivbord\Server\.\data\cache\main_file_cache.dat (Det gÕr inte att hitta filen) [java] at java.io.RandomAccessFile.open(Native Method) [java] at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(RandomAccessFile.java:212) [java] at java.io.RandomAccessFile.<init>(RandomAccessFile.java:98) [java] at org.hyperion.cache.Cache.<init>(Cache.java:78) [java] ... 7 more [java] 2010-nov-14 21:52:45 org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init [java] INFO: Loading definitions... [/code]
main_file_cache.dat not sure exactly what this file does or how it need to look, please help!
